Author: Iscariiot
Text: Ate a normal amount of healthy food over a period of months and it fell off like water.

Author: innocentpurities
Text: This might count as asking for tips but I’m not sure because it’s not directly asking “how do I lose 10 lbs” but people might use responses to use as tips and this sub doesn’t promote tips that don’t help with harm reduction. I know you might just be curious about people’s experiences and didn’t even think about this as “tiPz n tRiCkz” but others might take it as that depending on people’s responses. I think this is up to your judgement and the mods’ judgement but if you think it’s fine then at the very least could you add a trigger warning because people can be very sensitive to these topics. I’m sure you want the best for everyone here as well so I’m just offering my perspective and maybe you could possibly reconsider this post. Thanks! c:
